comment.author: 47327169@N06
comment._content: Wow - This is fantastic! I remember learning about the glass plate photography - difficult to get the negative, takes some skill. I believe it was called Collodian Wet Plate?

comment.author: 32741315@N06
comment._content: Hi Peter According to our catalogue record, this is a dry plate negative - according to this website dry plate techniques made taking photographs simpler than earlier wet plate techniques. -- Courtney
comment.authorname: National Library NZ on The Commons

comment.author: 47327169@N06
comment._content: Ah, thank-you for the clarification. It is greatly appreciated.
